nodes.text: Mustafarian Soldiers, also known as Mustafar Sentries, were nothern Mustafarians enlisted by the Confederacy of Independent Systems to guard their smelting facilities on the planet Mustafar.
When Sith Lord Darth Vader came to eliminate the Separatist Council in its secret bunker, two Mustafarian sentries let him pass and were spared from his wrath.
